name: ボクらの消しゴム落とし 新学期
name_original: ボクらの消しゴム落とし 新学期
description:
Play more! Hit it! Poke it off!
The new school year begins with our Eraser Droppers!
Battle anytime, anywhere!

The nostalgic game "Eraser Dropper" is here!
Pop your opponent's eraser off the desk!
There are many easy games that can be played by one to a maximum of six players in a variety of modes!
The "Eraser Dropper" has been reborn with the "New School Year".
Let's have fun together with your friends and family!

Over 400 different erasers can be used!
The long-awaited "6-player" support and "Stage Edit" are now available!
Create your own original erasers and stages to play against each other!

Battle
Battle Road" to defeat enemies that appear one after another and "Battle" to advance.
You can also practice with your favorite erasers and stages in "Training".
You can also practice with your favorite erasers and stages in "Training".

Eraser Quest
A game of "Sugoroku" in a fantasy world!
Adventure around the world and collect gold.
Aiming to defeat the Daimon-Oh while adventuring the world and collecting gold!

Eraser Race
Operate the Eraser-kuns in the machine and face off in a heated race on the desk!
The Eraser-kuns in the machine are controlled to compete in a heated race on the desk!
You can try "Time Attack" to set a new record or "Grand Prix" to win the race by running all the courses.
Challenge the "Time Attack" to set the best record, or the "Grand Prix" to run all the courses and win!

Customize Eraser
Create your own original eraser by freely combining parts!
You can use the eraser you created in each mode.
The erasers you create can be used in each mode. Create the strongest eraser by your own hands!

Stage Edit
Create your own original stage by combining desks and stationery!
Create your own original stages by combining desks and stationery!

Party Game
Unusual stages and rules!
Let's have fun playing against each other or cooperating with others!

Mysterious School Bag
Use the points you collect in each mode to get the eraser!
Aim to complete the game!

*The game features a variety of unusual erasers, but they are all erasers.
*Controllers are required for multiplayer play.
